title: SUPERPRICE
content: Created a full stack grocery shopping website with a team of 5 members following an agile workflow.
stack: Spring-Boot, React, Docker, NodeJS, AWS EC2, AWS ECR, REST APIs, MySQL

title: Music Subscription Website using Serverless Backend
content: Built a site to query and subscribe to different music artists using a serverless backend.
stack: React, AWS EC2, DynamoDB, AWS Lambda, AWS S3, Apache2, TailwindCSS

title: Full Stack Todo Web App
content: Made a fully fuctional full stack website that allows you to create an account and add different task to it which can be accessed from any device by logging in.
